Alone in the Dark.Description:
Psychological Horror meets Southern Gothic in this reimagination of the classic survival horror game, Alone in the Dark
This love letter to the ground-breaking original lets you experience a haunting story through the eyes of one of two protagonists.

Dragon\u2019s Dogma 2.Description: The story begins in an underground gaol where the Dragon's voice echoes in the fog of lost memories.

SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY!.Description: From South Park Digital Studios, the studio that brought you South Park: The Stick of Truth, South Park: The Fractured but Whole, and South Park: Phone Destroyer comes the next chapter in the journey of the New Kid.

DORONKO WANKO.Description: 『DORONKO WANKO』 is a DORONKO Action Game.

Open Roads.Description: In Open Roads, players will experience the story as 16-year-old Tess Devine, on a road trip with her mother, Opal, to discover what has been left behind in evocative places forgotten to time.

Content Warning.Description: Film your friends doing scary things to become SpöökTube famous! (strongly advised to not go alone).

Children of the Sun.Description: Burning with anger, THE GIRL wages a one-woman war against THE CULT, taking them down cultist by cultist, bullet by bullet, until she reaches her true target: THE LEADER.

Harold Halibut.Description: Dive into this nautic adventure as curiosity will guide you through a spaceship, wrecked on an unknown planet made up of water.

No Rest for the Wicked.Description: From Moon Studios, the award-winning developers of Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps comes No Rest for the Wicked, a visceral, precision Action RPG set to reinvent the genre.

Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes.Description: Our story begins in one corner of Allraan, a tapestry of nations with diverse cultures and values.

Another Crab's Treasure.Description: Another Crab’s Treasure is a soulslike adventure set in a crumbling underwater world plagued by a mysterious curse.

Stellar Blade.Description: Project Eve is an action-adventure game that takes place in the not-too-distant future on the ruined Earth against unknown enemies.

Indika.Description: The game is set in alternative Russia of the 19th century.

Hades II.Description: The first-ever sequel from Supergiant Games builds on the best aspects of the original god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler in an all-new, action-packed, endlessly replayable experience rooted in the Underworld of Greek myth and its deep connections to the dawn of witchcraft.

V Rising.Description:
A Vampire Survival Experience
Awaken as a weakened vampire after centuries of slumber.

Animal Well.Description: Explore a dense, interconnected labyrinth, and unravel its many secrets.

Little Kitty, Big City.Description: You're a curious little kitty with a big personality, on an adventure to find your way back home.

Senua's Saga: Hellblade II.Description: The sequel to the award winning Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice, Senua returns in a brutal journey of survival through the myth and torment of Viking Iceland.

Frostpunk 2.Description: Discover a city-survival game set 30 years after an apocalyptic blizzard ravaged Earth, transforming our world into a harsh, icy wasteland.

Black Myth: Wu Kong.Description: A world unseen, where new sights rise with every stride.

Star Wars Outlaws.Description: Set between the events of Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back and Star Wars: Return of the Jedi, players will step into the role of Kay Vess, a clever scoundrel in the galactic underworld.

Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn.Description: Join humanity’s last stand as Gods and guns collide in an all-new action-RPG open-world adventure.

Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown.Description: A racing game and lifestyle experience on Hong Kong Island, recreated at 1:1 scale.

Silent Hill 2 (Remake).Description:
Having received a letter from his deceased wife,
James heads to where they shared so many memories,
in the hope of seeing her one more time: Silent Hill.

Assassin's Creed Shadows.Description: A new Creed rises over Japan.

Path of Exile 2.Description: Path of Exile 2 is a new seven-act storyline that is available alongside the original Path of Exile 1 campaign.

Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2.Description: Sired in an act of vampire insurrection, your existence ignites the war for Seattle's blood trade.

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Rema.Description: The Prince has returned! Experience the classic tale that redefined action-adventure gaming in this full-scale remake for a new generation.

The Wolf Among Us 2.Description: Play as Bigby, “The Big Bad Wolf” and Sheriff of Fabletown, as you return to a gritty detective noir world where there are no fairy tale endings.

Manor Lords.Description: An upcoming strategy game for PC that combines deep, organic and realistic city building with large scale, tactical battles.

Hollow Knight: Silksong.Description: Hollow Knight: Silksong is the epic sequel to Hollow Knight, the epic action-adventure of bugs and heroes.

Death Stranding 2: On The Beach.Description: Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA.

Grand Theft Auto VI.Description:
WELCOME TO LEONIDA
Grand Theft Auto VI heads to the state of Leonida, home to the neon-soaked streets of Vice City and beyond in the biggest, most immersive evolution of the Grand Theft Auto series yet.

Little Devil Inside.Description:
Explore, discover, adapt, fight and survive
experience a world filled with atmospheric contrasts
embark on hostile missions and journeys that challenge
your survival instincts and the choices you make.

XDefiant.Description: XDefiant is a free-to-play, fast-paced arena shooter that combines intense gunplay with personalized loadouts and specialized factions, as teams of gunfighters – called Defiants – battle for domination.

Grand Theft Auto V.Description: Rockstar Games went bigger, since their previous installment of the series.

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt.Description: The third game in a series, it holds nothing back from the player.

Portal 2.Description: Portal 2 is a first-person puzzle game developed by Valve Corporation and released on April 19, 2011 on Steam, PS3 and Xbox 360.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive.Description: Counter-Strike is a multiplayer phenomenon in its simplicity.

Tomb Raider (2013).Description: A cinematic revival of the series in its action third person form, Tomb Rider follows Lara in her least experience period of life – her youth.

Left 4 Dead 2.Description: Cooperative survival continues with a different set of characters.

Portal.Description: Every single time you click your mouse while holding a gun, you expect bullets to fly and enemies to fall.

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.Description: The fifth game in the series, Skyrim takes us on a journey through the coldest region of Cyrodiil.

BioShock Infinite.Description: The third game in the series, Bioshock takes the story of the underwater confinement within the lost city of Rapture and takes it in the sky-city of Columbia.

Borderlands 2.Description: Sequel to the 4-player cooperative FPS RPG Borderlands, where the new team of Vault Hunters arrives on the infamous planet Pandora in order to get the riches, hidden inside the Vault, and help to free the planet from the Handsome Jack, President of Hyperion.

Half-Life 2.Description: Gordon Freeman became the most popular nameless and voiceless protagonist in gaming history.

Destiny 2.Description: Destiny 2 is an online multiplayer first-person shooter.

BioShock.Description: FPS with RPG elements, Bioshock invites players to experience horrors of underwater isolation in the city of Rapture, the failed project of the better future.

PAYDAY 2.Description: The gang is back, and they have bigger and better plans.

Limbo.Description: This popular 2D puzzle-platformer creates the atmosphere of isolation, where the player alone can guide the nameless protagonist to his destination.

Fallout 4.Description: The fourth game in the post-apocalyptic action RPG series from Bethesda studious brings players back to the retro-future.

Terraria.Description: Terraria is a 2D action adventure sandbox game, where players create a character and gather resources in order to gradually craft stronger weapons and armor.

Warframe.Description: Warframe is an online free-to-play cooperative third-person looter shooter.

Grand Theft Auto IV.Description: Every crime story is a story of a search for success.
